title: 2018 United States elections
summary: The 2018 United States elections were held on Tuesday, November 6, 2018.[lower-alpha 3] These midterm elections occurred during the presidency of Republican Donald Trump. Thirty-five of the 100 seats in the United States Senate and all 435 seats in the United States House of Representatives were contested. Thirty-nine state and territorial governorships as well as numerous state and local elections were also contested.
